name: UniRep
innovation_summary: Trained a multiplicative LSTM on UniRef50 to produce fixed-length protein embeddings for downstream design tasks.

name: TAPE Transformer
innovation_summary: Released a protein transfer learning benchmark with transformer encoders and standard evaluation splits.

name: ProGen
innovation_summary: Applied large-scale transformer decoding on curated protein families to enable controllable sequence generation.

name: ProtBERT
innovation_summary: Scaled BERT-style masked language modelling on billions of amino acids with domain-specific tokenisation and distributed training.

name: ESM-1b
innovation_summary: Extended masked protein transformers with 650M parameters to capture long-range residue contacts.

name: ProtGPT2
innovation_summary: Adopted GPT-2-style autoregressive modelling on protein sequences to sample diverse de novo designs with controllable conditioning.

name: ProtT5-XL
innovation_summary: Adapted the T5 span-denoising objective to proteins for zero-shot annotation and fold prediction.

name: ProteinBERT
innovation_summary: Jointly optimised global and residue-level predictions via hierarchical supervision for protein function understanding.

name: ESM-2
innovation_summary: Trained up to 15B-parameter masked protein transformers with rotary embeddings and extensive evolutionary data.

name: ESMFold
innovation_summary: Combined ESM-2 representations with end-to-end structure prediction to infer 3D folds without multiple sequence alignments.

name: EvoDiff
innovation_summary: Used residue-space diffusion conditioned on protein embeddings to design functional proteins across scaffolds.

name: ProGen2
innovation_summary: Expanded autoregressive modelling with conditioning tags for structure and function objectives across protein families.
